Articles.Content:
I need to know, what do people reckon is a better mod for procedural wings?

pWings by NathanKell, or B9 Aerospace procedural parts by Bac9... This isn't a competition, or anything, I just want to know what people think before I install.

Depending on what you considered as "better". pWings currently has better stability due to its released nature. B9pwings with its experimental functions and stuff gives better features. So it is all personal preference atm.
Yeah I should have elaborated.. That's exactly what I wanted to know about, was stability and compatibility issues. Thanks!

Pwings are actually by DYJ (and Taverius); I've just been maintaining the code a bit recently.

I would say that bac9's system is a much neater one, so unless you have .craft that need the old pwings, use bac9's.
